title: Login Issue
body: I can no longer login to my PBE account.  My username is the same for my normal account.  I believe they may be contradicting each other.  Also my last time on the account I purchased 15 chests and they did not load on the account.   The chests may still be bugged.

replies.body: Double check that you're using the right username and password as opposed to your live account. If you know it's correct and still not working, go ahead and hit up our account agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
